About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Enthusiastic and detail-oriented Front End Developer with 2 years of experience building responsiveand user-friendly web applications. Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript and front-endframeworks such as ReactJs, NextJs, VueJs and NuxtJs. Passionate about staying up-to-date with emerging web development technologies and committed to continuous learning and improvement.

WORK EXPERIENCES

Front End Developer

Core Initiative Studio

Slicing Ecommerce Catalog website from Figma to VueJs. Website consists of 3 types of designs: men section, women section and unavailable product. Connecting website with Fake Store API. Deploying website with Netlify.

UI Designer

Paperplane Studio (Team)

Designing wireframe, mockup, high fidelity prototype for ICARE INDONESIA based on Android mobile app. There are two user interfaces for Patient and Nurse.

Internship as Multimedia Flash Design

Dinas Komunikasi dan Informasi Kabupaten Bogor

Making and designing Company Profile with Adobe Flash.
